Uses of Class
org.opensha.eq.forecast.Distances

  • Packages that use Distances 
    Package Description
    org.opensha.eq.fault.surface  
    org.opensha.eq.forecast  
    org.opensha.gmm
    Provides implementations of all GroundMotionModels used in the 2008 and 2014 USGS National Seismic Hazard Models.

    • Uses of Distances in org.opensha.eq.fault.surface

      Methods in org.opensha.eq.fault.surface that return Distances 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Distances AbstractGriddedSurface.distanceTo(Location loc) 
      Distances GriddedSubsetSurface.distanceTo(Location loc) 
      Distances RuptureSurface.distanceTo(Location loc)
      Returns the distance metrics commonly required by PSHA ground motion models (GMMs): rJB, rRup, and rX.

    • Uses of Distances in org.opensha.eq.forecast

      Methods in org.opensha.eq.forecast that return Distances 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Distances Distances.compute(GriddedSurface surface, Location loc)
      Compute distance metrics: rJB, rRup, and rX.
